level.text: 5605.1 The Director shall charge fees for the following oversight activities as set forth herein:
Review of plans and specifications and performing site inspections for UST installations shall be two hundred dollars ($200.00) per tank; and
Performing site inspections and review of reports related to UST abandonment shall be two hundred dollars ($200.00) per tank.
Reviews identified in ยง 5605.1(a) and (b) shall be completed in 21 days. The initial review period may be extended for an additional two-week period.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 46 DCR 7699 (October 1, 1999); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 56 DCR 6678 (August 21, 2009).
